mapper.select: SELECT reserv_id, user_id, pet_id, h_id, reserv_date, reserv_time, reserv_apply_time, reserv_content, reserv_status, reserv_memo FROM reservation WHERE reserv_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} And h_id = #{hospitalId} ORDER BY reserv_date, reserv_time

SELECT u.name AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, u.email AS userEmail, COALESCE(p.pet_name, '펫 등록 x') AS petName, COALESCE(p.pet_species, '펫 등록 x') AS petSpecies, COALESCE(p.pet_breed, '펫 등록 x') AS petBreed, COALESCE(p.pet_gender, '펫 등록 x') AS petGender, COALESCE(p.pet_age, 0) AS petAge, COALESCE(p.pet_picture, 'petdefault.png') AS petPicture FROM reservation r JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN pet p ON r.pet_id = p.pet_id WHERE r.reserv_id = #{reservationId};
